name: Mordechai Ben David
description: '''Mordechai Werdyger''' ({{Langx|he|מרדכי וורדיוגר}}; born April 16, 1951) is an American Israeli [[Hasidic Judaism|Hasidic Jewish]] singer and songwriter who performs under the [[stage name]] '''Mordechai Ben David''' ({{langx|he|מרדכי בן דוד|Mordocháy Ben-Davíd|Mordechai, son of David}}) or simply '''MBD'''. He has released over 46 albums while performing internationally. He has headlined at charity concerts, especially those of [[HASC Concert|HASC]] and [[Ohel (social services)|Ohel]].
